text.name: info4
text.text: Memory: 8 KB RAM plus 64 KB video RAM

text.name: info9
text.text: The PC Engine was jointly developed by Hudson Soft and NEC Home Electronics.

text.name: info10
text.text: It was the first console released in the 16-bit era, albeit still utilizing an

text.name: info11
text.text: 8-bit CPU. It ended up competing with the Genesis and SNES.
